attributes.action: Not allow advertising for abortions on TV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is against the advertising of abortion not abortion itself.
We feel abortions advertised on TV will be offensive and heart breaking for people that disagree with it or have had to make the choice at some stage.  Everyone is aware of the service and feel its would be totally unfair to have this put in peoples faces when it is such a sensitive issue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
